mapper.select: SELECT SUBSTR(DETAIL_CODE, 0, 2) AS dept_code1, DETAIL_CODE_NAME AS dept_name1 FROM BCO100T WHERE COM_CODE ='H002' AND DETAIL_CODE_NAME IS NOT NULL AND SUBSTR(DETAIL_CODE, 1, 2) != '76' GROUP BY SUBSTR(DETAIL_CODE,1,2) ORDER BY DETAIL_CODE

SELECT SUBSTR(DETAIL_CODE, 0, 2) AS dept_code1, DETAIL_CODE AS dept_code2, SUBSTR(DETAIL_CODE_NAME, INSTR(DETAIL_CODE_NAME, ' ') + 1) AS dept_name2 FROM BCO100T WHERE COM_CODE = 'H002' AND DETAIL_CODE_NAME LIKE '% %' ORDER BY DETAIL_CODE

SELECT a.cert_gbn, b.detail_code_name AS cert_name FROM hzz140t a, ( SELECT detail_code, detail_code_name FROM bco100t WHERE com_code = 'H012' AND detail_code IN ('1', '2') ) b WHERE b.detail_code = a.cert_gbn (+) GROUP BY a.cert_gbn

SELECT b.exp_date, b.pern_no, b.usrname, b.usrrepre_num, a.join_date, a.retr_date, a.dept_code, a.dept_name, b.cert_gbn, b.exp_resn, b.exp_cnt, b.han_date, b.seq FROM hpa100t a, hzz140t b WHERE a.pern_no = b.pern_no (+) AND b.pern_no IS NOT NULL
AND b.usrname LIKE '%' || #{usrname} || '%'
AND b.pern_no LIKE '%' || #{pernNo} || '%'
AND (SUBSTR(a.dept_code, 0, 2) = #{deptCode} OR a.dept_code = #{deptCode})
AND b.cert_gbn = #{certGbn}
AND (b.exp_date BETWEEN REPLACE(#{expStartDate}, '-', '') AND REPLACE(#{expEndDate}, '-', '') OR b.exp_date BETWEEN REPLACE(#{expStartDate}, '-', '') AND REPLACE(#{expEndDate}, '-', ''))
ORDER BY b.exp_date DESC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{pageIndex}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hpa100t a, hzz140t b WHERE a.pern_no = b.pern_no (+) AND b.pern_no IS NOT NULL
mapper.update: MERGE INTO hzz140t A USING DUAL ON ( A.PERN_NO = #{pernNo} AND A.SEQ = #{seq} ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.usrname = #{usrname}, A.exp_date = REPLACE(#{expDate}, '-', ''), A.han_date = REPLACE(#{hanDate}, '-', ''), A.cert_gbn = #{certGbn}, A.exp_cnt = #{expCnt}, A.usrrepre_num = #{usrrepreNum}, A.work_period1 = #{workPeriod1}, A.work_period2 = #{workPeriod2}, A.work_period3 = #{workPeriod3}, A.usrfield1 = #{usrfield1}, A.usrfield2 = #{usrfield2}, A.exp_resn = #{expResn}, A.usraddr = #{usraddr}, A.usrbirth = #{usrbirth} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.pern_no, A.SEQ, A.usrname, A.exp_date, A.han_date, A.cert_gbn, A.exp_cnt, A.usrrepre_num, A.work_period1, A.work_period2, A.work_period3, A.usrfield1, A.usrfield2, A.exp_resn, A.usraddr, A.usrbirth ) VALUES ( #{pernNo}, seq_hzz140t.next_value, #{usrname}, REPLACE(#{expDate}, '-', ''), REPLACE(#{hanDate}, '-', ''), #{certGbn}, #{expCnt}, #{usrrepreNum}, #{workPeriod1}, #{workPeriod2}, #{workPeriod3}, #{usrfield1}, #{usrfield2}, #{expResn}, #{usraddr}, #{usrbirth} )
